DataSourcePortable.Name: Indicadores materiais - Giro de estoque
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT (CASE
 WHEN (SUM(A.VALORMEDIOESTOQUE) = 0) THEN 0
 WHEN (SUM(A.VALORMEDIOESTOQUE) > 0) THEN (SUM(A.VALORCMV) / SUM(A.VALORMEDIOESTOQUE))
 END) GIROESTOQUE
 FROM PD_DWINDICADORREGISTROS A
 JOIN PD_DWINDICADORES ON PD_DWINDICADORES.HANDLE = A.DWINDICADOR
WHERE @CRITERIOSELECAO" /> <Fields> <DecimalField Alias="GIROESTOQUE" From="A" Path="GIROESTOQUE" FieldDecimalsFormat="2" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
